name: Pantry
longDesc:
You are in the pantry.
There is a lot of food in here, both for humans and pets.
There are three shelves stuffed with food.
There is a box of cornflakes on the top shelf, but you'll have to climb the shelves to get up there.
The only exit leads back out to the kitchen
description:
You are in the pantry.
The only exit leads back out to the kitchen

shelves.name: shelves
shelves.description: There are so many shelves and so many boxes on those shelves.

paper towels.name: paper towels
paper towels.description:
This is a very tall stack of paper towels. Who needs this many paper towels?
 You could probably reach the bottom shelf by climbing them.

cornflakes.name: cornflakes
cornflakes.description: A box of generic corn flakes. You need these to fix the shrink ray.
